text: is avadhi mein yadi tum (un) striyon ko vivaah ka sanket do athava apane man mein chhupaaye rakho, to tumapar koee dosh nahin. allaah jaanata hai ki unaka vichaar tumhaare man mein aayega, parantu unhen gupt roop se vivaah ka vachan na do. parantu ye ki niyamaanusaar[1] koee baat kaho tatha vivaah ke bandhan ka nishchay us samay tak na karo, jab tak nirdhaarit avadhi pooree na ho jaaye[2] tatha jaan lo ki jo kuchh tumhaare man mein hai, use allaah jaanata hai. atah usase darate raho aur jaan lo ki allaah kshamaasheel, sahanasheel hai
